sentences.sContent: The rebels have inflicted heavy casualties .
sentences.sCn: 叛乱者造成了大量的伤亡。

sentences.sContent: Our aim is to reduce road casualties .
sentences.sCn: 我们的目标是减少交通事故的伤亡人数。

synos.tran: 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室

phrases.pCn: 灾害保险；不幸事故保险

trans.tranOther: someone who is hurt or killed in an accident or war
